LanguageData.Cobra.label: cobra
LanguageData.Cobra.description: A cobra is a large snake with a venomous bite. Cobras can be highly aggressive if provoked or approached. It is better to stay away from these creatures if possible.
LanguageData.Monkey.label: monkey
LanguageData.Monkey.description: A monkey is a type of small primeape. It can use its curly 꼬리 to grab onto tree branches, which leaves its hands free to do other things.
LanguageData.Boomalope.label: boomalope
LanguageData.Boomalope.description: Engineered for chemical production, the boomalope grows a large sac of volatile chemicals on its back. Though it is weak and fragile for its size, other animals have learned to avoid it because of the huge explosion it produces when it dies.
LanguageData.Lacosdile.label: 라코스다일
LanguageData.Lacosdile.description: A 라코스다일 is a crossbred and genetically manipulated lizard originally created as part of clever fragrance marketing gig. Being herbivorous and barely dangerous made them very common pets. However as the trends passed 라코스다일s were soon found flooding the sewage 시스템s, and in desperation were carried off across the galaxy to the furthest reaches of space. As a result the species now 밀가루ish on desolate rimworlds, where they have adapted to become omnivorous.
LanguageData.Okapi.label: 오카피
LanguageData.Okapi.description: A giraffid artiodactyl mammal. 오카피s are primarily diurnal but may be active for a few hours in darkness. They are essentially solitary, coming together only to breed. 오카피s are herbivores, feeding on tree leaves and buds, grasses, ferns, fruits, and fungi. 오카피s inhabit canopy forests at altitudes of 500–1,500 m (1,600–4,900 ft).
